name: 計算共形幾何（二）
description: 本課程探討基於共形幾何所發展的數值演算法。在「計算共形幾何（二）」中，我們將介紹共形幾何及其相關數值演算法，以及三維流形中的計算問題。
goals: 培養應用數學解決問題的能力
以高觀點詮釋數學與其他學科連結
syllabus:
1.        Curve Theory (two weeks)

2.        Local Theory of Surface (two weeks)

3.        Theories of Compact Riemann Surface (two weeks)

4.        Harmonic Forms and Holomorphic Forms (two weeks)

5.        Quasi-Conformal Mappings (two weeks)

6.        Students' Midterm Reports (one week)

7.        Discrete Ricci Flow (two weeks)

8.        Discrete Three-Manifolds (two weeks)

9.        Optimal Mass Transport and Monge-Ampère Equation (two weeks)

Students'Final Reports (one week)

grading.note: 研讀相關書籍、近期及重要相關論文
